summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, regarding a request for assistance from Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The emails coordinate availability among FBI personnel to assist with this high-profile case.

events.title: FBI Request for Assistance on Epstein/Maxwell Investigation
events.description: FBI Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends a request for assistance related to the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, seeking available agents to help with the high-profile case.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20, focused on Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking (VCAC/HT), was actively seeking assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 2020.
The investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell was described as a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity' for assisting agents.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination to allocate resources to the case, indicating the investigation was ongoing and active at that time.
